Hih laibu a sim mite mi hampha hi a, hih thu kigente ngai-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a zuite zong mi hampha mah ahi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu kigente a tun ding hun hong naita hi.
Johan in Asia gam sungah a om pawlpi sagihte tungah a khak lai ahi hi.A beisa hun, tuhun le mailam hunah a om tawntung Pasian kiang pan le ama tokhom mai-ah a om Kha Siangtho sagihte tung pan le,

thuman takin teci a pang, sihna panin a kithokiksak Tapa upa, leitung kumpite tungah ukna aana a nei Jesuh Khrih kiang panin note tungah hehpihna le nopsakna thupha hong tung tahen.Tua Jesuh Khrih in eite hong it a, ama sihna tawh i mawhna panin eite hong suaktasak a,
ama Pa Pasian’ na a sem dingin siampi le kumpi za-ah a hong koih hi. Tua Jesuh in minthanna le vangliatna nei tawntung tahen. Amen.

En un, amah hong paita dinga, meiipi tawh hong tonkhawm ding hi. Teipi tawh amah a sunte a kipan mi khempeuh in a mu ding uh hi. Amah a hong pai ciangin leitung mi khempeuh lau-in a kap ding uh hi. Hih ka gen bangin hong piang takpi ding hi. Amen.
A beisa hun, tuhun le mailam hunah zong a om tawntung ding a Vanglian Topa Pasian in, “Kei pen na khempeuh a Kipatna le a Tawpna ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Note’ sanggam keimah Johan in Jesuh tawh kipawlna hangin note mah bangin bawlsiatna thuakin, Pasian’ Ukna sungah omin, lungduai takin a thuak mipa ka hi hi. Pasian’ thu le Jesuh’ hong gen thumante ka genna hangin Patmos a kici tuikulh-ah kei hong kikoih hi.

“Na muhte khempeuh laibu sungah gelh inla, Efesa pawlpi, Smyrna pawlpi, Pergamum pawlpi, Thiatira pawlpi, Sardis pawlpi, Filadelfia pawlpi, Laodisia pawlpi, hih pawlpi sagihte kiangah khak in,” hong ci hi.

A samte tuumul bangin kangin, khuavak bangin pak a, a mittangte meikuang a bang hi.
A khete, pumbukah a kihalsan sumngo bang a, a awging ahihleh tuipi ging a bang hi.

a nungta mipa zong ka hi hi. Kei ka si ngei hi. Ahi zongin tu-in hong en in, a nungta tawntung ka hi hi. Sihna le misite omna gam keima khutnuai ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-a na muh, tu laitakin a om thute le tu nung ciangin a hong piang ding thute, lai sungah gelh in.

Tu-in ka taklam khut sungah na muh aksi sagihte le kham kibawl meivakna sagihte a khiatna in: Aksi sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte’ vantung mite a cihna hi a, meivakna sagihte pen pawlpi sagihte a cihna ahi hi.
“Efesa khua-a pawlpi vantungmi kiangah lai gelh inla, a taklam khutah aksi sagih tawi-in, kham kibawl meivakna lakah a pai kawikawi Jesuh’ thugenna hih bang ahi hi:

Tua ahih manin zak nading bil a neite in Kha Siangtho in pawlpite kiangah a gen thute na za un. A gualzo mite tungah, Pasian’ Huan sunga om nuntakna singgahte a nek theih nadingun thu ka pia ding hi.

Tua hun ciangin mite in a sih theih nading uh a zonzon uh hangin sih theih nading lampi mu lo ding uh a, si nuam mahmah napi-un si thei het lo ding uh hi.
Tua kauphete’ pianzia pen galsim dingin a kithawi sakolte tawh kibang uh hi. A lu tung uhah kham lukhu tawh a kibang khu uh a, a maitang uh mihing maitang tawh a kibang hi.
A sam uh numei sam tawh kibang a, a ha uh humpinelkai ha tawh a kibang hi.
A awm uh, sik-awmdal tawh a kibang pian in tuam a, a khazap uh a gingte pen galkido laitakin sakol in a kaih leeng tampite’ gin tawh a kibang hi.
Momai bangin mei nei-in mi deh thei uh a, tua a mei uh tawh mihingte kha nga sung gimsak theih nading gu a nei uh hi.
Amaute in tua kuahawm thukpi a uk vantungmi pen kumpi-in nei uh a, tua vantungmi a min pen Hebru pau-in Abaddon hi a, Grik pau-in Apollion hi a, “A Susia pa,” a cihnopna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin a gukna vantungmi in a peengkul hong tum a, Pasian’ mai-ah a om kham kibawl biakna tau kiu lite panin awging khat ka za hi.
Tua awging in peengkul a tawi vantungmi a gukna kiangah, “Eufratis Gun lianpi-ah a kihencip vantungmi lite khah khia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin leitung mi khempeuh sehthumsuah sehkhat a thah ding uh a kum, a kha, a ni, a nai hun ngakin a kigingsa-in a om tua vantungmi lite a kikhahkhia hi.

Hih sakolte’ kam panin a hong pusuak meikuang, meikhu le kat, hih gimna nam thumte in leitung mi sehthumsuah sehkhat a sisak hi.

a nungta tawntung, vantung le a sunga om khempeuh, leitung le a sunga om khempeuh le tuipi le a sunga om khempeuh a bawl Pasian’ min tawh kiciam a, “Tu-in zekai nawn het lo ding hi.

singlamteh tungah amaute’ Topa a kithahna mun Sodom ahih kei leh Egypt minkhem a pua khuapi kongzingah a luanghawm uh kipaidak ding hi.

Amah nakpitakin kiko a, “Amah in mihingte thu a khen ding hun hong tungta ahih manin Pasian kihta unla amah phat un. Van le lei, tuinak le tuipite a bawlpa hong bia ta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi a nihna in hong zui a, “A Lian Babylon khuapi kicim, kicim! Amah a huk a lanna leenggahzu, mi khempeuh tungah pia-in khamsak a, gimna thuaksak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi a thumna in a masa tegel hong zui leuleu-in nakpitakin, “Tua ganhing le a lim bia-in a taltang ahih kei leh a khut tungah ciaptehna a ngah mi peuhmah in,

Amaute a kibawlsiatna mei, khu tawntung a, ganhing le a lim bia-in, a min kigelhna a nei mi peuhmah in a sun a zanin tatsat loin gimna thuak paisuak uh hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian’ thupiakna zui-in Jesuh tungah a citak Pasian’ mite adingin thuak zawhna kisam hi.

Tua ciangin vantung panin awging khat ka za a, “Tu a kipanin Topa thu-ah a si mite mi hampha mahmah ahi hi, cihna gelh in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kha Siangtho in, “Hi takpi hi. Amaute’ nasepna thaman in amaute zui ding ahih manin a nasep gimna panun tawlnga-in nuamsa-in om ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh meiipi a bang a kang biakbuak om a, tua meiipi tungah mihing tawh a kibang khat tu-in, kham lukhu khu-in, a khutah phiaukawi hiam khat a tawi ka mu hi.
Biakinn sung panin vantungmi khat hong pai khia a, meiipi tungah a tu mipa nakpitakin samin, “Leitung mite lak dingin min mahmah a, a lak hun hong tungta ahih manin na phiaukawi tawh at in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin meii tungah a tupa in leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite a at hi.
Tua ciangin vantung biakinn panin vantungmi adang khat hong pai khia leuleu a, amah in zong phiaukawi hiam khat mah a tawi hi.

Tua ciangin biakna tau panin vantungmi adang khat hong pai khia leuleu hi. Tua vantungmi pen mei a ukpa hi a, phiaukawi hiam a tawipa kiangah nakpitakin, “Leitung mite leenggah bangin minta ahih manin leitung mite na phiaukawi tawh atin a lom lomin kaikhawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin vantungmi in zong leitungah a phiaukawi hong van a, leitung mite kaikhawmin Pasian’ hehna lian leenggah cilna phualah a kaikhawm hi.
Khuapi pualamah kicil a, a cilna panin sisan vive luang khia-in, pi nga bang thukin, tai zanih ciang bangah tuikhang bangin a luang hi.
Tua ciangin vanah nalamdang lian mahmah khat ka mu hi. Gimna nam sagih a hong keng vantungmi sagih om uh a, Pasian’ hehna a lah tawpna uh ahih manin a nunung pente ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin mei tawh a kihel limlang peekpi kiphah tuipi tawh a kibang ka mu hi. Ganhing, a lim le a min nambat tawh a kipiasa a zote, Pasian’ lasakna harpte tawi-in tuipi tawh a kibang gei-ah a ding uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ nasem Moses la le Tuuno la sa uh a,“A Vanglian Topa Pasian aw,na nasepnate lamdangin lian mahmah hi.Khang tawntung a Kumpipa aw,na nasepnate-ah thumanin na thutang hi.

Topa aw, nang,kua in hong kihta lo dinga,na liatna hong phat lo ding ahi hiam?Nang bek na siangtho hi.Thumanin na sepnatemi khempeuh in mu uh ahih maninminam khempeuhnang kiangah hong pai-in,na mai-ahhong bia ding uh hi,”a ci uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin ka khuadak leh a sungah Pasian’ Ompihna Mun a om vantung biakinn a kihong ka mu hi.
Tua biakinn sung panin vantungmi sagih, gimna sagih tawh hong pusuak uh a, puanpak silhin, kham awmgak tawh a awm uh a gak uh hi.
Ganhing lite sung panin khat in a nungta tawntung Pasian’ hehna a dim hai sagih, vantungmi sagihte kiangah a pia hi.
Tua biakinn sungah Pasian’ minthanna le a vangliatna khu kidim ahih manin, vantungmi sagihte in hong paipih gimna sagih a ven matengin biakinn sungah kuamah lut thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn panin awging khat in vantungmi sagihte kiangah, “Leitungah va pai unla, hai sungah a om Pasian’ hehnate va sung khia un,” ci-in awging lianpi tawh a genna ka za hi.
Tua ahih manin a khatna vantungmi va pai-in leitungah hai va bung a, a tungah ganhing ciaptehna a neite le a lim a bia mite tungah a kihhuai meima a na mahmah hong piang hi.
A nihna vantungmi in tuipi tungah a hai hong bung a, tuipi tuite misite’ sisan tawh kibang hong suak ahih manin tuipi sungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh a si hi.
A thumna vantungmi in gunte le tuinakte tungah a hai hong bung a, a tui khempeuh sisan a hong suak hi.
Tua ciangin tuite a uk vantungmi in,“A beisa hun a kipanintuhun dongin a om a Siangtho Pa aw,hih bangin na thukhenna-ahnang na thuman hi.
Amaute in mi siangthote lekamsangte’ sisan luangsak uh ahih manintu-in amaute’ dawn dinginsisan a pia na hi hi.Hih pen amaute’ ngah dingina kilawm ahi hi,”a cihna thu ka za hi.
Tua ciangin biakna tau panin aw khat hong ging a,“A Vanglian Topa Pasian aw,na thukhennate thumanin thutang hi,”a cihna ka za hi.
A lina vantungmi in ni tungah a hai hong bung a, ni in a satna tawh mite a kaang gawp hi.
Nisa in mite kaang gawp ahih manin mite in hih gimna tawh kisai-ah thu a nei Pasian a samsia uh hi. Ahi zongin a mawhna uh panin kisikin Pasian a phat ding uh ut lo uh hi.
A ngana vantungmi in ganhing tokhom tungah a hai hong bung a, tua ganhing’ ukna gam sung tengah khua hong mial hi. Mite in na a sak manun a leii pet uh a,
a meimate uh na a sak manun vantung Pasian a samsia uh hi. Ahi zongin a gamtat siatna uh panin kisik nuam lo uh hi.
A gukna vantungmi in Eufratis Gun lianpi tungah a hai hong bung a, nisuahna lam kumpite hong pai nading lam a bawl kholhna-in a tuite hong kangcip hi.
Tua ciangin gulpi kamsung, ganhing kamsung le a man lo kamsangpa’ kamsung panin uiphuk tawh a kibang kha gilo thum a hong pusuak ka mu hi.
Tuate pen dawite’ kha hi a, nalamdang a bawl uh hi. A Vanglian Pasian’ Ni hong tun ciangin gal a do dingin leitung gam khempeuh ah a om kumpite a kaikhawm dingin a kuan khia uh hi.
(“Na ngai un! Guta bangin kei ka hong pai hi. Mihon lakah guaktangin pai-in maizumna a ngahkhak loh nadingun a puante uh kemin, pilvang khuaphawkin a om mite a hampha ahi uh hi.”)
Tua khate in Hebru pau-in Armageddon a kici munah kumpite a kaikhawm uh hi.
A sagihna vantungmi in huihlakah a hai hong bung a, biakinn sung tokhom panin nakpitakin aw khat hong gingin, “Man khinta hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin khua hong phia-in, a ging lianpi hong om a, van hong gingin nakpitakin zin hong liing hi. Zinliing khempeuh lakah a husia pen ahih manin mihing a pian zawh hih bang zinliing omngei nai lo hi.
Khuapi phelthum kisuah a, gam sunga om khuapi dang khempeuh kisia hi. Pasian in Babylon khuapi mangngilh lo a, ama hehna ahi leenggahzu a hai sung panin Babylon khuapi a dawnsak hi.
Tuikulh khempeuh mangthang a, mual khempeuh mai mang hi.
Gial gol pipi, khat ciangin tawi sawmthum val a gik, van panin mite tungah hong kia hi. Tua gimna nasialua ahih manin tua gialte hangin mite in Pasian a samsia uh hi.
Tua ciangin hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte sung panin kei kiangah khat hong pai a, “Hong pai in; gun tampi gei-ah a kilam a paktat mahmah khuapi gimna a kipiakzia ding kong lak ding hi.
Leitung kumpite in tua a paktat mahmah nu tawh gamtat hoih lo gamta uh a, leitung mite in ama paktatna leenggahzu dawnin a kham uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Kha Siangtho tawh kidimin ka om a, vantungmi in gamlak mun khatah hong tunpih hi. Tua lai-ah, a tungah min hoih lo nam tuamtuam a dimin a kigelh ganhing a san khat tungah numei khat a tu ka mu hi. Tua ganhing in lutang sagih le ki sawm a nei hi.

Tua numei in puan a dupsan le a ausan silh a, kham, suangmanpha le kep kibawl kizepna a tuamtuamte tawh a pumpi dimin kizem a, a paktatna hangin a kihhuai a nin mahmah nate a dimin a omna kham hai khat a tawi hi.
A taltang tungah, “A paktat numeite le leitung kihhuainate khempeuh a pianna, A Lian Babylon Khuapi,” ci-in khiatna tuamkhat a nei min a kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin mi siangthote le Jesuh tungah a cihtak uh manin a kithat mite’ sisan dawnin zukham a batna ka mu hi.Tua numei ka muh ciangin lamdang ka sa mahmah hi.
Ahi zongin vantungmi in keima kiangah, “Bang hangin lamdangsa na hi hiam? Tua numei le amah a pua, lutang sagih le ki sawm a nei ganhing a cihnopna thu kong gen ding hi.

Tua na muh ganhing nidangin a om hangin tu-in om nawn lo hi. Ahi zongin tu-in kuahawm thukpi panin hong pusuakin sihna a thuak dingin pai khia ding hi. Tua ganhing nidangin omngei a, tu-in om nawn lo napi-in khatvei hong kilangkik ding ahih manin, a nungta mite’ min a kikhumna laibu sungah leitung pianma-in a kigelh nai lo, tu laitakin leitungah a om mite in tua ganhing a et uh ciangin lamdangsa ding uh hi.
Hih thu-ah pilna le thutheihna kisam hi. Lutang sagihte pen tua numei a tutna mual sagih ahi hi.

Tua lutang sagihte pen kumpi sagihte zong a cihna ahi hi. Tua kumpi sagihte lakah nga bei zo a, khat in ukna aana neilai a, khat pen a hong piang lai ding ahi hi. Amah a hong kilat ciangin tomno sung bek om ding hi.
Nidangin omngei a, ahi zongin tu-in a om nawn lo ganhing pen kumpi sagihte tawh a kipawl a kumpi giatna hi a, sihna thuak dingin a pai ding ahi hi.
Ki sawmte pen gam uk dingin a hong kipan nai lo kumpi sawm hi a, ahi zongin a ganhing tawh kumpi aana a neikhawm dingin nai khat sung bek a hun kipia ding hi.
Hih mi sawmte in ngimna khat nei uh a, vangliatna le aana a neih teng uh a ganhing tungah a pia uh hi.
Amaute in Tuuno a sim ding uh hi. Ahi zongin Tuuno pen kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa ahih manin, amah le ama sap, a teel, citakin amah a zuite in tua kumpi sawmte a zo gawp ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in hong genthuah lai a, “A paktat numei a tutna gun tuite pen minam tuamtuam, pau nam tuamtuam a zang mihonpite ahi hi.
Tua na muh ganhing le a ki sawmte in a paktat numei mudah ding uh hi. Ama neih khempeuh laksakin a pumguakin koih ding uh a, a sa ne-in mei tawh haltum ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama thugente a tun theih nadingin ama deihna bangin amaute in a sepnop nading uh lungsim guan a, lungsim kikhatin ganhing tungah amau’ ukna aana a piasak hi.
Na muh numei pen leitung kumpi khempeuh tungah ukna a nei khuapi ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vantung panin vantung midang khat a hong paisuk ka mu hi. Amah in aana a lian mahmah nei a, ama vang in leitung buppi a taan hi.
Amah nakpitakin kiko a,“A Lian Babylon khuapi kicim, kicim!Tu-in dawite’ kua suak khinta-in,kha gilote’ omna suak khinta a,a kihhuai, a muhdahhuaivasa namkim in omna-inneita uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehama hukna leenggahzumi khempeuh dawnsak a,leitung kumpite tawh paktat a,ama hukna hanginleitung sumbawlte ina hauhlawh uh hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin aw dang khat ka za a,“Keima mite aw, a mawh gamtatna-ahkihel kha-in a gimthuaknathuakpih kha ding na hih manunhong pai khia un.
Ama mawhna in van ban a,a gamtat hoih lohnatePasian in phawk gige hi.
Amah in note hong bawl banginama tungah gamta unla,ama tungaha zah nihin thukkik un.Amah in note a hong dawnsaka zah nihin a khauh leenggahzuama dawn dingina hai sungah sung un.
Amah kisialina kiphatsakna zah tawh a kizui-indahna le lungkhamnathuaksak un.Amah in, ‘Kei kumpinu ka hi a,meigong numei lah ka hi kei a,dahna ka thuakngei kei ding hi,’ ci ahih manin,
gimna inni khatthu-in ban dinga,pulnatna, kahna lekialpi in vat gawp ding hi.Ama tungah thu a khenTopa Pasianvanglian ahih maninmei tawh kihaltum ding hi,”a ci hi.
Amah tawh paktatin a kiphasak khawm leitung kumpite in tua khuapi a katna meikhu a muh uh ciangin dahin a kap ding uh hi.
Ama thuakna kihta-in a gamlapi-ah om ding uh a,“Hih a vanglianBabylon khuapi in a thuakna,bangzah takin lauhuai-in,bangzah takin nasia!Nai khat sung bekinhih zah gimna thuak!”ci ding uh hi.
Amaute’ na zuakte kuamah in lei nawn lo ahih manin leitung sumbawlte zong tua khuapi’ thuakna hangin dahin a kap uh hi.
A khamte, a ngunte, a suangmanphate, a kepte, a puanpakte, a puansante, a nai puante, a khausante, a singnamtuite, a sing manphate, a saihate, a sumngote, a sikte, a suangkangte,

a sinnamon singnamtuite, a singteh namtuite, a myrrh paknamtuite, a saledi-te, a leenggahzute, a sathaute, a annelte le mangbuhte, a bawngte le a tuute, a sakolte le a leengte le mihing ahi a silate uh kuamah in lei nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih manin sumbawlte in tua khuapi kiangah,“Deihin na lunggulhgulhna khempeuh maimangta a,na hauhna lena nopcitna teng beita a,cikmah cianginna ngahkik nawnkei ding hi,”a ci uh hi.
Tua khuapi sungah sumbawlin a hauhlawh mite in ama thuakna a muh uh ciangin lau-in a gamlapi-ah dingin kapin thum ding uh a,
“Hih a lian khuapi in a thuakna,bangzah takin lauhuai,bangzah takin nasia!Puan hoih nono,a dupsan le a sante silhin,kham, suangmanpha lekepte tawh a kizem ngei khuapi!
Nai khat sungina hauhna khempeuh mai mang ta!”a ci uh hi.Teembaw ukte le a tungah a tuangte, teembaw hawlte le tuipi tungah nuntakna a zongte a gamlapi-ah ding uh a,
a khuapi katna khu a muh uh ciangin,“Hih zahin a lian khuapikoi lai-ah om ahi hiam?”ci-in a kiko uh hi.
A kah a thum kawmun a lu tung uhah leivui thehin kap uh a,“Tuipi teembawa nei khempeuh ina hauhlawh uh hih khuapibangzah takin lauhuai-in nasia ahi hiam?Nai khat sunginmaimangta hi.
Vantung aw,ama siatna hangin lungdam in.Mi siangthote,sawltakte le kamsangte aw,note tungahhong gamtatna hanginPasian in ama tungahthukhennapia khinta ahih maninlungdam ta un,”a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a thahat vantungmi khat in angawina suang tawh a kibang suang lianpi khat la-in tuipi sung denna a,“A lian Babylon khuapihih bangin kilawn dinga,kimukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Harp lasakna a ging lela sate’ awging,tamngai le peengkul awgingte,nang sungah kiza nawn lo ding hi.Nasem a tuamtuamtenang sungah kimu nawn lo dinga,angawina a ging zongkiza nawn lo ding hi.

Na sungah meivak taang zongkimu nawn lo dinga,a kiteeng nungak le tangvala lungdamte’ awging kiza nawn lo ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh na sumbawlte,leitungah a thahat pen hi a,na ai tawh leitung mi khempeuhna khem hi.
Nang Babylon khuapi,hih bangin gim hong kipiakna penkamsangte le mi siangthoa kithatte’ sisan leleitungaha kithat mi khempeuh’ sisannangma sungaha kimuhna hang ahi hi,”a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin vantungah mihonpi a kikona awging tawh a kibang khat ka za a,“Pasian phat un! Hotkhiatna,minthanna le vangliatna peneite’ Pasian-a’ ahi hi.
A thukhennate thumanin thutang a,a paktatna tawhleitung mi khempeuh a siasak,a paktat nu tungah thu khenkhinta a,ama nasemte a thahsakna hanginama tungah a phu la khinta hi,”a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin khatvei kikokik leuleu uh a,“Pasian phat un!Tua khuapi a katna khutatsat loin van lamahkhuto tawntung hi,”a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin upa sawmnih le lite le ganhing lite in tokhom tungah a tu Pasian mai-ah kunin bia uh a, “Amen! Pasian phat un!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tokhom panin aw khat hong ging a,“Amah a kihtaa lian a neu mite,le ama nasem khempeuhte aw,eite’ Pasian phat un,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tuizeu ging le vanging tawh a kibang mihonpi kikona awging bang khat ka za a,“A Vanglian eite’ Topa Pasiankumpi suakkhin ahih maninPasian phat un.
Tuuno’ zineih ding hunhong tungta a,a Lawmnu a kithawisa-inomkhin ahih maninlungdam kipakinamah phat ni.
Puan hoih mahmah,siangin a pak mahmahte,ama silh dingin kipia hi,”a ci uh hi. Tua puan hoih pen Pasian’ mi siangthote’ gamtatna mante ahi hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi in keima kiangah, “Hih thu gelh in: Tuuno’ zineihna pawi-ah a kisam mite a hampha mahmah ahi hi,” hong cih khit ciangin, “Hihte pen Pasian’ gen taktak kammal ahi hi,” hong cithuah lai hi.

Tua ciangin amah a bia dingin a khe phungah ka kunsuk a, ahi zongin amah in, “Kei hong bia kei in. Kei pen Jesuh’ hong thugente a lenkip nang le na sanggamte khempeuh tawh nasemkhawm khat ka hi hi. Pasian bia in!” hong ci hi. Jesuh’ thugen in kamsang nasep sepnop nading lungsim a guan ahi hi.
Tua ciangin vantung a kihong ka mu a, sakol kang khat a om hi. A tungah a tuang pa pen a Citak a Thuman pa kici hi. Amah in thumanin thu khenin gal a do hi.
A mittangte meikuang tawh kibang a, lukhu tampi a khu hi. Amah sim loh kuamah dang in a theih loh min khat ama tungah a kigelh hi.
Sisan sungah a kidiah puantualpi khat silh a, amah pen, “Pasian’ Thu,” cihna min tawh a kisam hi.
Vantung galkapte a siangtho puanpak hoih tawh kizem uh a, sakol kangte tungah tuangin amah a zui uh hi.

Minam dangte a zawh gawp nading namsau hiam khat a kam sung panin a pusuak hi. Amah in sik ciangkhut tawh minam dangte ukin, a Vanglian Pasian’ heh mahmahna tawh leenggah cilna-ah leengtui a suk khia ding hi.
A puan tung le a phei tungah, “Kumpite’ Kumpi, topate’ Topa,” ci-in a min kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin ni sungah vantungmi khat a ding ka mu a, amah in vankim lai-ah a leeng vasa khempeuh nakpitakin samin, “Pasian’ pawi lianpi-ah a kikhawm dingin hong pai un.
Hong pai unla, kumpite’ sa, galkapmaangte le galkapte’ sa, sakolte le a tungah a tuangte’ sa, a lian a neu, silate le sila ahi lo mi khempeuhte’ sa hong ne un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin sakol tungah a tuang pa le a galkapte a sim dingin ganhing le leitung kumpite a galkapte uh tawh a kikaikhawm ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin a ganhing le tua ganhing omna-ah nalamdang a bawl kamsang zuau pa kiman khawm hi. Ganhing ciaptehna a neite le ganhing lim a biate pen tua na lamdangte tawh a kikhem ahi hi. Ganhing le kamsang zuau pa, a nihun kat kikhulna meiphualpi sungah a hingtangun kilawn hi.
Sakol tungah a tuang pa’ kam panin a hong pusuak namsau in amaute’ galkap khempeuh thatlum khin a, vasate khempeuh in a nek zawh zahzahun amaute’ sa a ne uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantung panin vantungmi khat hong paisukin, kuahawm thukpi honna tawhtang le sikkhau khainiang golpi khat a tawi ka mu hi.
Amah in tanglai gulpi, Dawimangpa ahih kei leh Satan zong a kici pa manin kum tulkhat sung a hencip hi.

Tua ciangin kuahawm thukpi sungah khiasuk a, kum tulkhat a cin mateng minam tuamtuamte a khemtheih nawn loh nadingin a tawh kalhin a ciamteh hi. Kum tulkhat a cin khit ciangin tawlkhat sung a kikhah ding ahi hi.

Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi pawlkhat ka mu a, tua mite tungah thukhen nading aana a kipia ahi hi. Jesuh thu a genna le Pasian thu hangin a kithat mite’ kha zong ka mu hi. Tua mite in ganhing ahi a, a lim ahi zongin bia lo uh hi; a taltang uhah ahi a, a khut tung uhah ahi zongin ganhing ciaptehna nei lo uh hi. Amaute hong hingkik uh a, Khrih tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana a neikhawm uh hi.
Kum tulkhat a cin mateng a si dangte hingkik lo uh hi. Hih pen sihna panin thawhkikna a masa ahi hi.

Hih thawhkikna masa sungah a kihel mite pen Pasian’ mi siangtho hi a, a hampha mahmah ahi uh hi. Nihvei sihna in tua bang mite bangmah cih zo nawn lo dinga, amaute pen Pasian le Khrih’ siampite hi ding uh a, amah tawh kum tulkhat sung ukna aana nei ding uh hi.
Kum tulkhat a cin ciangin a thongkiatna panin Satan kikhah dinga,
Gog le Magog a kici leitung gam khempeuh ah a om minam khempeuh a khem dingin kuan khia ding hi. Satan in a galsimpih dingin tuipi gei-a sehnel zahin a tam mihonpi kaikhawm ding hi.
Leitung khempeuh ah amaute pai uh a, Pasian’ mi siangtho omna mun le Pasian in a it khuapi umcih uh hi. Ahi zongin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amaute a kaangtum hi.
Amaute a khem Satan pen ganhing le kamsang zuau pa a omna mun, kat a kikhulna meiphualpi sungah kilawn a, a sun a zanin tua lai munah amaute in gimna a thuak tawntung ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin tokhom kang a lian khat le a tungah a tupa ka mu hi. Ama omna panin lei le van leng khia mang a, a tunna mel uh kithei lo hi.

A lian a neu misite tua tokhom mai-ah dingin laibute a kilem ka mu hi. Tua ciangin a nungta mite a kigelhna laibu adang khat zong a kilem ka mu hi. Amaute’ gamtatna tua laibute sungah a kigelhna tawh kizui-in misite tungah thu a kikhen hi.
Tuipi sungah a om misite, tuipi in hong pusuah a, Sihna le Misite’ Gam in zong amau sungah a om misite hong pusuah uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekpi-in amaute’ gamtatnasa tawh kizui-in thu a kikhen hi.
Tua ciangin Sihna le Misite’ Gam, meiphualpi sungah a kilawn hi. Hih meiphualpi pen sihna nihna ahi hi.
A nungta mite a kigelhna laibu sungah a min a om lo peuhmah meiphualpi sungah kilawn hi.
Tua ciangin van thak khat le lei thak khat ka mu hi. Van masa le lei masa mai mang khin a, tuipi zong om nawn lo hi.
Mothak khat a pasal tawh a kituah dingin a kizem bangin vantung Pasian kiang panin Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua thak a hong paisuk ka mu hi.

Tokhom panin nakpitakin awging khat ka za a, “Tu-in Pasian omna inn pen mite tawh omkhawm ta hi. Pasian in amaute ompih dinga, amaute pen ama mite hi ding uh hi. Pasian mahmah amaute tawh omkhawm dinga, amah pen amaute’ Pasian hi ding hi.
Amaute’ mit panin khitui khempeuh nulsak ding hi. Thu luisate mai mang khinta ahih manin sihna, dahna le na sa-a kahna cihte om nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tokhom tungah a tupa in, “Tu-in na khempeuh a thakin ka bawl hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin, “Hih thute thumanin muantaak ahih manin lai-ah gelh in,” hong ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tu-in man khinta! Kei pen a kipatna le a tawpna a cihna Alfa le Omega ka hi hi. A dangtak mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna tuinak panin a khongin tui ka pia ding hi.
A gualzo mi khempeuh in kei tung panin a ngah ding thu in: Kei pen amaute’ Pasian ka hi dinga, amaute keima ta ahi ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin a meidawite, a lehtatte, a lampialte, mi thatte, a paktatte, aisante, milim biate le zuau gente om nading mun pen sihna nihna ahi kat a kikhulna meiphualpi kuang sung ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin gimna nunung sagihte a dimin a om hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte sung panin khat kei kiangah hong pai-in thu hong gen a, “Hong pai in; Tuuno zi, a Mothak kong lak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua laitakin Kha Siangtho tawh ka kidim a, tua vantungmi in mual sang mahmah khat dawnah hong paipih hi. Vantung Pasian kiang panin a hong paisuk Khuapi Siangtho ahi Jerusalem khua a hong lak hi.
Tua khuapi pen Pasian’ vang tawh tee ziazua a, Jasper suangmanpha bangin taang a, Kristal suangmanpha bangin siang kilkel hi.
A kulh sahin sang mahmah a, kulhkongpi sawm le nih nei-in, a kongpite-ah vantungmi sawm le nih om a, a kulhkongpite tungah Israel minam sawm le nihte’ min kigelh hi.
Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah thum, leitaw lamah thum, nitumna lamah thum mah om hi.
Tua khuapikulh pen kulh tawphah suang sawm le nih tungah a kiciang hi a, tua suangtawphahte tungah Tuuno sawltak sawm le nihte’ min kigelh hi.
Keima kiangah thu a hong gen vantungmi in tua khuapi, a kulhkongpite le a kulh a teh nadingin kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a nei hi.
Tua khuapi a pang kikim linlian a, a dung a vai a kikim ahi hi. A ciang tawh khuapi a teh ciangin tai tul le zanga bang pha a, a dung, a vai le a sanna kikim hi.
A kulhpi zong ama zat tehna tawh a teh ciangin pi zanih sawmkhat guk a sang hi.
A kulhpi dingin jasper suangmanpha kiciang a, a khua sung pen kham citak tawh a kibawl hi a, limlang bangin siang kilkel hi.
Tua khuapi kulh suangtawphahte pen suangmanpha namkim tawh kizem hi. A masa-in jasper suangmanpha, a nihna-ah sapfira suangmanpha, a thumna-ah agate suangmanpha, a lina-ah emerald suangmanpha,

a ngana-ah onik suangmanpha, a gukna-ah karnelian suangmanpha, a sagihna-ah khrisolait suangmanpha, a giatna-ah beryl suangmanpha, a kuana-ah topaz suangmanpha, a sawmna-ah khrisoprase suangmanpha, a sawm le khatna-ah jakinth suangmanpha, a sawm le nihna-ah amethyst suangmanpha tawh a kizem hi.
A kongpi sawm le nihte kep sawm le nih tawh a kibawl hi a, kongpi khat ciangin kep sabit khat ahi hi. A khuapi sung lampite kham citak vive hi a, limlang bangin a sung kimu paisuak thei hi.
A Vanglian Topa Pasian le Tuuno pen khuapi biakinn hita ahih manin tua khua sungah biakinn dang ka mu kei hi.
Pasian’ minthanna vang pen khuavak hi a, Tuuno zong meivak hi khin ahih manin tua khuapi in nitaang le khataang cihte kisam lo hi.
Tua a taang sungah leitung mite lam pai ding uh a, leitung kumpite in a neihsa khempeuh uh hong paipih ding uh hi.
Zan khuamial hun cih om lo ding ahih manin kulhkongpite khak hun cih om loin a tawntungin kihong paisuak ding hi.
Leitung mite’ hauhna le liatna teng tua khuapisung hong kitunpih ding hi.
Ahi zongin a siang lo, a hoih loin a gamta mi, zuau a gen mite kuamah lut thei lo ding uh a, a nungta mite a kigelhna Tuuno laibu sungah a min a omte bek tua khuapi sungah lut thei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in Pasian le Tuuno tokhom panin a hong luang khia, kristal suangmanpha bangin a tee selsel gun tui hong lak a,

khuapi sung lampi laizangah a luang hi. Tua gun pang tuakah nuntakna singkung po a, kha simin gah ahih manin kum khat sungin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. A tehte zong natna dam nading zatui-in kizang hi.
Pasian’ samsiatna a ngah peuhpeuh tua khua sungah om lo hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno’ tokhom om dinga, ama nasemte in amah a bia ding uh hi.
Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, a taltang tung uhah ama min kigelh ding hi.
Topa Pasian pen amaute’ khuavak hi-in, a tawntungin amaute in uk paisuak ding uh ahih manin khuamial hun cih om nawn lo dinga, khua a vaksak ding meivak le nitaang cihte kisam lo ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Hih thute muantaak a, thuman ahi hi. Kamsangte tungah a Kha Siangtho a pia Topa Pasian in a hong piang baih ding thute, a nasemte tungah a lak dingin a vantung mite a hong sawl hi,” hong ci hi.
Jesuh in, “Kei a hong pai baihta ding ka hi hi. Hih laibu sunga kigelh thu a zui mite mi hampha ahi hi,” a hong ci hi.
Keimah Johan in hih thute za-in ka muh ahi hi. Hih thute za-in ka muh ciangin hih thute kei tungah a hong lak vantungmi a bia dingin a khe phungah ka boksuk hi.
Ahi zongin amah in, “Kei hong bia kei in. Kei pen nang le na sanggamte le hih laibu sungah a om thu a zui mite tawh nasemkhawm khat ka hi hi. Pasian bia in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a tun ding hong naita ahih manin imcip kei in.
A gilo mite gilo lailai henla, a kihhuai gamtatte kihhuai gamtat lailai henla, a hoih gamtatte hoih gamtat lailai henla, a siangtho mite a siangtho mah hi lailai tahen!” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesuh in, “Kei ka hong pai baihta dinga, mi khempeuh a gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in a thaman ding uh ka hong puak ding hi.
Kei pen a masa le a nunung, a kipatna le a tawpna a cihnopna ahi Alfa le Omega ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.
Khuapi kulhkongpi sungah a lut theih nading le nuntakna singgah a nek theih nadingun a puan uh a siangin a sawp mite, mi hampha ahi uh hi.
Ahi zongin a lampial mite, aisan mite, a paktat mite, mi thatte, milim biate le zuaugen nuamsa-in zuau a gengen mite, khuapi pualamah a om uh hi.
“Keimah Jesuh in pawlpite adingin hih thute nang kiangah a hong gen dingin ka vantungmi ka hong sawl hi. Kei pen David’ zung le a suan ahi, zingsol ka hi hi,” a hong ci hi.

Kha Siangtho le Mothak in Jesuh kiangah, “Hong pai in,” a ci uh hi. Hih thu a za mi khempeuh in zong Jesuh aw, “Hong pai in,” ci ta uh hen. A dangtak mi khempeuh hong pai uh henla, a deih khempeuh in nuntakna tui a khongin hong la ta uh hen.

Keimah Johan in hih laibu sungah a kigelh thu a za mi khempeuh ka hong hilhkholh nopna panin: A thu a behlap na om uhleh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate note tungah hong behlap dinga,

hih laibu sungah a kigelh thute a hem khia na om uhleh Pasian in zong hih laibu sungah a kigelh nuntakna singgah le Khuapi Siangtho sungah na ngah ding uh hamphatnate note kiang panin hong hepkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih thu khempeuh hong genin teci a pang mipa in, “Ka hong pai baih taktak ding hi,” hong ci hi. Na cih bangin hi ta peuh hen. Topa Jesuh aw, hong pai ta in!
Topa Jesuh hong hehpihna thupha, note khempeuh tungah hong om tahen. Amen.
